name: MARKBUG
description:
MARKBUG is a shooter game made to markjam#1.

You're mark, but in an alternative universe, killing all variants from markverse.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

W/A/S/D - Move

Arrows - Move

space - Shoot

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CREDITS

Starry Space Parallaxing Background - Enjl (itch.io)

1000+ Nintendo Sound Effects - GameSupplyGuy (itch.io)

A Rift In Space - bubbaerikson (itch.io)

8-Bit Sound Effects Library - Little Robot Sound Factory (opengameart)
